com.crowdin.client.core.http

Interface JsonTransformer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JacksonJsonTransformer

    public interface JsonTransformer
    Json serializer/deserializer. Default implementation JacksonJsonTransformer uses jackson json library. For proper enum serialization/deserialization please take a look at EnumConverter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> java.lang.String convert(T obj) 
      <T> T parse(java.lang.String json, java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
      This method will always work with non-generic java classes like ProjectResponseList.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        <T> T parse(java.lang.String json,
            java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        This method will always work with non-generic java classes like ProjectResponseList. This was done in order to avoid any library-specific annotations and hard dependency on library itself. And for implementation developer can use any library without any issues with generics.
        Type Parameters:
        T - return type
        Parameters:
        json - json
        clazz - return type
        Returns:
        java class instance

      • convert

        <T> java.lang.String convert(T obj)
        Type Parameters:
        T - object type
        Parameters:
        obj - object to convert
        Returns:
        json string
